channel.title: Comments on: Shelly asks, “How do I move to a new email address?”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Ray Hollister
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description: Ha ha! Yeah, they just haven't gotten to you yet, Denise. (Hopefully they don't read our comments!)
item.content:encoded: Ha ha! Yeah, they just haven’t gotten to you yet, Denise. (Hopefully they don’t read our comments!)

item.title: By: denise jones
item.dc:creator: denise jones
item.description: I beg to differ here with you I left att about two years ago to go to comcast internet (I use gmail however) was concerned with losing my att mail and after talking to att they told me it would disappear. However two years later I still have it and use it daily for all my junk mail saving gmail for the important things. so maybe I just got lucky or missed? lol ...denise
item.content:encoded: I beg to differ here with you I left att about two years ago to go to comcast internet (I use gmail however) was concerned with losing my att mail and after talking to att they told me it would disappear. However two years later I still have it and use it daily for all my junk mail saving gmail for the important things. so maybe I just got lucky or missed? lol …denise
